Communication is everything

Discord is where the action happens and is the main communication channel of eosDAC for everything from discussions, questions, support, and meetings.

Connect with us on Discord

Telegram is where general community discussions
take place.

Connect with us on Telegram

eosDAC Help Center

Find our Help Center and Knowledge Base at Zendesk. It includes the FAQs about Block Production, Worker Proposals, Voting and Tokens. Furthermore, you can create a support ticket for individual requests.
